attributes.action: Prevent a UK/US trade deal during the Trump administration.
attributes.additional_details: The current Trump administration has proven to be volatile, one sided and adversarial and therefore we believe that a trade deal between the UK and the US would be detrimental for the UK.
attributes.background: We believe that a UK/US trade deal would not be in the best interests of the UK during the Trump administration and call on the UK Government and serving Prime Minister to put a hold on such a deal.
